title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
quoteText: You will indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Vimeo and its subsidiaries, parents, and affiliates, and their and our respective directors, officers, employees, and agents, from and against all third-party complaints, demands, claims, damages, losses, costs, liabilities, and expenses, including attorneyâ€™s fees, arising from or relating to: (a) the content you submit to or through the Services. and (b) allegations of actions or omissions by you that (regardless if proven) would constitute a breach of this Agreement.
